data.comment: The match is underway in Bordeaux.
Benoit Bastien awards Bordeaux a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Benoit Bastien awards the home team a throw-in.
Bordeaux to take a throw-in in Nantes territory.
Throw-in for Nantes in the half of Bordeaux.
In the minute 8, Nantes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Bordeaux get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
In the minute 12, Ball safe as Bordeaux is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Nantes.
Throw-in Nantes.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Nantes in the half of Bordeaux.
Mehdi Zerkane (Bordeaux) has been shown a straight red card by referee Benoit Bastien.
Moses Simon gets his shot on target but fails to score for Nantes.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Nantes.
Benoit Bastien signals a Nantes throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
Throw-in for Bordeaux in the half of Nantes.
In the minute 38, Bordeaux pushes forward through Toma Basic, whose finish on goal is saved.
In Bordeaux Bordeaux attack through Otavio. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bordeaux.
In the minute 40, Can Nantes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bordeaux's half?
Hwang Ui-Jo for Bordeaux gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Nantes at Matmut Atlantique.
In the minute 44, In Bordeaux, Nantes push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In Bordeaux a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
Hwang Ui-Jo's header is off-target for Bordeaux.
In the minute 45, Nantes have a goal kick.
Benoit Bastien blows to end the first-half.
Charles Traore (Nantes) gets a yellow card.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Nantes to take a throw-in in Bordeaux territory.
Jean-Louis Gasset is making the team's first substitution at Matmut Atlantique with Remi Oudin replacing Josh Maja.
Throw-in for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
In the minute 49, Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Bordeaux just outside Nantes's area.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 52, Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
In the minute 56, Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
Nantes drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Bordeaux in their own half.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
Nicolas De Preville (Bordeaux) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Corner awarded to Nantes.
In the minute 61, Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nantes needs to be cautious. Bordeaux have an attacking throw-in.
Bordeaux's Otavio breaks free at Matmut Atlantique. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 62, It's a goal kick for the away team in Bordeaux.
Nantes are pushing forward but Pedro Chirivella's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
In the minute 64, Jimmy Briand is replacing Nicolas De Preville for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
The away team have replaced Kalifa Coulibaly with Bridge Ndilu. This is the first substitution made today by Christian Gourcuff.
In the minute 71, Free kick Nantes.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Laurent Koscielny is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 75, Bordeaux make their third substitution with Enock Kwateng replacing Maxime Poundje.
The home team replace Hwang Ui-Jo with Samuel Kalu.
Bordeaux's Laurent Koscielny is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 77, Bordeaux have a goal kick.
Benoit Bastien awards the away team a throw-in.
Dennis Appiah is replacing Charles Traore for the away team.
In the minute 82, Christian Gourcuff (Nantes) is making a third substitution, with Marcus Coco replacing Samuel Moutoussamy.
Nantes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Benoit Bastien signals a Bordeaux throw-in in Nantes's half.
In the minute 85, Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Nantes.
Otavio is booked for the home team.
In the minute 89, Corner awarded to Nantes.
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Pedro Chirivella (Nantes) has received a first yellow card.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Nantes in the half of Bordeaux.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Benoit Bastien awards Nantes a goal kick.
Nantes are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bordeaux.
In Bordeaux a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-0.
Ludovic Blas is on a sub for Abdoul Kader Bamba for Nantes.
Bridge Ndilu (Nantes) gets a yellow card.
